name: Sprite Dash (Phive)
description:
A light-hearted Newground-ish minigame. Launch and fly your Sprite bottle and see how far it can go. 

Controls & Tips:

  1. Shake the Sprite and release it to see how far it travels. Use A and D to tilt for boost and aerodynamical lift!
  2. Watchout for your height as you will freeze and drop if your altitude is too high!
  3. You can use the banana as slope, or not, or even use it backwards!

Getting the Trees and the mountains (eggs) to work took me quite a chunk of time that I didn't have time for further polishing. But I'm glad that the game works in general now.

(Edit: I removed my personal record because I realized that screensize might play into it and I have no method to fix that)
